snippet.title: STRANGE TOWN - FIRST TRAILER
snippet.description:
Strange Town is a local multiplayer/multiplayer survival-themed role-playing game. The main objective of the game is to find and punish the traitor, and go to the "Exit Points" of this magical world to leave it, as the world slowly deteriorates and toxic gas clouds start to cover the map. At the same time, one or two players will become Werewolves, posing another challenge for the innocent players to overcome.

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1740250/Strange_Town/?l=english&curator_clanid=4777282&utm_source=SteamDB
